verbs.label: Operate
verbs.description: Pursue something: an opportunity, an objective, or an enemy.

verbs.label: Travel
verbs.description: The one called Exile told me: 'It's all just one long march.'

verbs.label: Relinquish
verbs.description: Sometimes we must lose in order to gain. That is the crux of a sacrifice.

verbs.label: Reconnoitre
verbs.description: Scout the field of battle. Go carefully.

verbs.label: Communicate
verbs.description: 'To me the right time for negotiations is after a victory when, backed by force, words seem to attain a meaning not so well understood before.' - Sir Adrian Carton de Wiart, Happy Odyssey
